articles.author: Chloe Melas, CNN
articles.title: Richard Herd, 'Seinfeld' and 'Get Out' actor, dead at 87 - CNN
articles.description: Richard Herd, a veteran character actor who appeared in dozens of films and television series, has died, a representative for the actor told CNN.
articles.content:
(CNN)Richard Herd, a veteran character actor who appeared in dozens of films and television series, has died, a representative for the actor told CNN.
